title: Take a Look
subtitle: "I prefer speaking through visuals"
description: A quiet person who expresses herself through the language of design. Not because she cannot speak, but because visuals are more honest than words.
synopsis:
Shen Muchuan saw a designation online: AptS:1548. Curiosity led her to learn about ESAP, and then she stayed.

Not because she was persuaded, and not because of any dramatic turning point. She simply felt that the stories here deserved to be presented properly.

This is the story of someone who speaks through visuals.
